isTranslucencySupported

public static boolean isTranslucencySupported()
Checks if is translucency supported.

返回：
true, if is translucency supported
从以下版本开始：
3.5
另请参见：
GraphicsDevice.isWindowTranslucencySupported(TRANSLUCENT) at JDK1.7 or later, com.sun.awt.AWTUtilities.isTranslucencySupported(AWTUtilities.Translucency.TRANSLUCENT) at JDK1.6_u10 or later
